skills.name: COLLAPSE
desc: • Deals random damage to a single target.
• 65% Chance to grant 100% Critical Strike Chance to all allies for 1 turn.
• 40% Chance to inflict Grievous Burns on the target for 2 turns.

skills.name: WHIM OF THE FALLEN
desc: • Grant a Random Shield to each ally for 1 turn.
• Consume all burns on all enemies.

skills.name: INEXTINGUÍBILI CRUCIATUM
desc: • Remove all Immunity effects, including Perfect Immunity and Vanish, from all enemies at the start of battle.
